resources.string: This is a text explaining what the below list is
This is the image of the animal, shown inside this RecyclerView.\n\n Tap here to continue
This is the name of the animal, shown inside this RecyclerView.\n\n Tap here to continue
This is a row inside the RecyclerView with animal image and name.\n\n Tap here to continue
This is the EditText. Here you can write Animal names and add them to the RecyclerView.\n\n Tap here to continue
This is the add button. You can use it to add as many animals as you want inside the RecyclerView. All you have to do to add the item is to click on that button.\n\n Tap here to continue
This is a play button, placed on a Toolbar.\n\n Tap here to finish
